name: Hello, World.
description:
Hello, World is an adorable, low-poly game with a casual city-building aspect. Solve problems for the odd creatures of the land while maintaining the village to satisfy your little villagers. There is no combat and no stress, take your time and linger when needed. You are god, you belong here. Welcome.

With it's calming soundtrack, beautiful colors, and casual game-play Hello, World is a perfect Sunday afternoon.

MeatballParm Games is a one woman/one dog team comprised of Madison Karrh and Buster Brown. I hope you enjoy exploring this world as much as I enjoyed creating it!
